name: DMZ-the-lizard
description:
Game made for the ludum dare 46 !

We wanted to teach one of our friend to make a game from scratch so we stayed really simple, hope you will like it :)

You recently bought a new terrarium for DMZ !

Now you need to setup his new home so he got a correct temperature, humidity and everything to keep him happy ! 

But keep in mind to not surcharge the terrarium and keep not stress him too much.

Credits : Laila Bouchara, Charlotte Fries & Ioana Roșca
